segments.text: This kitchen is a picture of domesticity gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes her plate oblivious to the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water rushes from the faucet, overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is filthy and spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is soaked; how gross is that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high could topple into the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids' antics are just as troubling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the wobbly stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's endangering himself for a snack; it's reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilt makes my stomach turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging with her open hand looks spoiled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like that, without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside mocks the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to step into this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
